attributes.action: Overseas aid funds diversion to the NHS and Environment Agency
attributes.additional_details:
We are giving aid to countries which have the nuclear bomb and a space program while our country is flooded and people are dying because of cuts in the NHS.

British tax paying subjects are not receiving proper care and attention which they have paid for!.

Aid is being sent overseas to countries which are squandering it on advanced projects while the poor of that country have not seen any improvement in their living conditions

Review the overseas aid NOW, and stop sending aid to countries which are not improving the environment of its poorer, less advantaged residents.

The money saved can then be used by the NHS and the Environment Agency in the UK.
